definition: A type of establishment where skilled individuals engage in manual labor, typically involving the creation, repair, or maintenance of physical objects. It is commonly used to refer to small businesses or workshops specializing in traditional craftsmanship and trades.

examples.english: The craft business has many orders.

examples.german: Mein Vater führt einen kleinen Handwerksbetrieb.
examples.english: My father runs a small craft business.

examples.german: Der Handwerksbetrieb bietet verschiedene Dienstleistungen an.
examples.english: The craft business offers various services.

examples.german: Der Handwerksbetrieb hat eine lange Tradition.
examples.english: The craft business has a long tradition.

examples.german: In unserem Handwerksbetrieb arbeiten qualifizierte Fachkräfte.
examples.english: Qualified professionals work in our craft business.
